defaultBranch.title: Default Branch
defaultBranch.description: Sets the default branch on the repository. The default value is 'master'

gitCommitMessage.title: Git Commit Message
gitCommitMessage.description: Sets the commit message on the repository. The default value is 'initial commit'

allowRebaseMerge.title: Allow Rebase Merges
allowRebaseMerge.description: Allow rebase merges. The default value is 'true'

allowAutoMerge.title: Allow Auto Merges
allowAutoMerge.description: Allow individual PRs to merge automatically when all merge requirements are met. The default value is 'false'
